mapper.select: SELECT sdsn.node_code, dsna1.attribute_value nodeName, dsna2.attribute_value attribute1 FROM sys_data_struct_node sdsn LEFT JOIN sys_data_struct_node_attribute dsna1 ON sdsn.struct_code = dsna1.struct_code AND dsna1.attribute_code = 'chinese_name' AND sdsn.node_code = dsna1.node_code LEFT JOIN sys_data_struct_node_attribute dsna2 ON sdsn.struct_code = dsna2.struct_code AND dsna2.attribute_code = 'english_name' AND sdsn.node_code = dsna2.node_code WHERE sdsn.struct_code = 'app_information' AND enabled_flag = 'Y' ORDER BY sdsn.display_order

select information_id ,show_pic ,title ,content ,isvisible ,create_date ,update_date ,create_by ,detail_url ,use_module ,share_image_url ,is_banner_show ,show_order from app_information where 1=1 and use_module=#{useModule} order by show_order
